title: "23 - Collaboration and Open Science Initiatives in Primate Research"
excerpt: "In this chapter, we discuss how large-scale collaboration, a research model successfully implemented in other fields, makes it possible to obtain the large and diverse datasets needed to conduct robust comparative analysis of primate cognitive abilities."
